content:
I'm happy to help! However, I think there might be some confusion. As a conversational AI, I don't have access to information about specific events or workshops organized by your company. I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or memories, and I don't have access to information about specific companies or events.

But I can provide general information on leadership workshops and the topics you mentioned!

Effective communication, conflict resolution, and strategic planning are all important aspects of leadership development. A leadership workshop that covers these topics might include activities such as:

* Role-playing exercises to practice active listening and effective communication
* Case studies or group discussions on conflict resolution strategies
* Interactive sessions on strategic planning, such as SWOT analysis or goal-setting exercises

If you're looking for more information on leadership development or want to discuss these topics further, I'd be happy to help!
